wxPGMEditableState Class Reference

#include <manager.h>

Inheritance diagram for wxPGMEditableState:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Contains information about wxPropertyGridManager's user-editable state, as returned by wxPropertyGridManager::SaveEditableState().
